languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс прожигает взглядом сначала вас, а потом Маражая.{/n} "Привилегии Вольного Торговца в действии, так? Я давно не испытываю иллюзий по поводу человеческой натуры, но должен отметить — не ожидал, что у кого-то может хватить низости связаться с подобной мразью".

{n}Heinrix's burning glare moves from you to Marazhai.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's privileges in action, I presume? I have long since abandoned any illusions I may have had about human nature, but I must admit I didn't expect someone to stoop so low as to consort with filth like this."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс прожигает взглядом сначала вас, а потом Маражая.{/n} "Привилегии Вольного Торговца в действии, так? Я давно не испытываю иллюзий по поводу человеческой натуры, но должен отметить — не ожидал, что у кого-то может хватить низости связаться с подобной мразью".

I have long since abandoned any illusions I may have had about human nature, but I must admit, I didn't expect that someone would stoop so low as to consort with filth like him."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの燃えるような視線が、あなたからマラズハイに移る。{/n}「自由開拓者の特権ってやつか？人間の本性について抱いていた幻想を捨てて久しいが、奴みたいなクズと関わるほど卑しい人間がいるとは思わなかったな」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's burning glare moves from you to Marazhai.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's privileges in action, I presume? I have long since abandoned any illusions I may have had about human nature, but I must admit I didn't expect someone to stoop so low as to consort with filth like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの燃えるような視線が、あなたからマラズハイに移る。{/n}「自由開拓者の特権ってやつか？人間の本性について抱いていた幻想を捨てて久しいが、奴みたいなクズと関わるほど卑しい人間がいるとは思わなかったな」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希怒视着你，随后死死地瞪着玛拉斋。{/n}“我猜，这就是行商浪人的特权吧。虽然我早就放弃了对人性的幻想，但我不得不承认，我真的没想到居然有人会堕落到这种地步，和这种卑劣的玩意儿混到一起。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's burning glare moves from you to Marazhai.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's privileges in action, I presume? I have long since abandoned any illusions I may have had about human nature, but I must admit I didn't expect someone to stoop so low as to consort with filth like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希怒视着你，随后死死地瞪着玛拉斋。{/n}“我猜，这就是行商浪人的特权吧。虽然我早就放弃了对人性的幻想，但我不得不承认，我真的没想到居然有人会堕落到这种地步，和这么卑劣的人走在一起。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}La ardiente mirada de Heinrix se desplaza de ti a Marazhai.{/n} «Sus privilegios de Comerciante Independiente en acción, asumo. Hace tiempo que abandoné toda ilusión sobre la naturaleza humana, pero debo admitir que no esperaba que alguien cayera tan bajo como para confraternizar con una alimaña como esta».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's burning glare moves from you to Marazhai.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's privileges in action, I presume? I have long since abandoned any illusions I may have had about human nature, but I must admit I didn't expect someone to stoop so low as to consort with filth like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}La ardiente mirada de Heinrix se desplaza de ti a Marazhai.{/n} «Sus privilegios de Comerciante Independiente en acción, asumo. Hace tiempo que abandoné toda ilusión sobre la naturaleza humana, pero debo admitir que no esperaba que alguien cayera tan bajo como para confraternizar con una alimaña como él».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrixs flammender Blick richtet sich auf Marazhai.{/n} "Die Privilegien {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, nehme ich an? Ich habe längst alle Illusionen abgelegt, was die menschliche Natur angeht. Doch ich muss zugeben, ich hätte nicht erwartet, dass Ihr so tief sinkt, Euch mit Abschaum wie ihm zusammenzutun."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's burning glare moves from you to Marazhai.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's privileges in action, I presume? I have long since abandoned any illusions I may have had about human nature, but I must admit I didn't expect someone to stoop so low as to consort with filth like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' flammender Blick richtet sich auf Marazhai.{/n} "Die Privilegien {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, nehme ich an? Ich habe längst alle Illusionen abgelegt, was die menschliche Natur angeht. Doch ich muss zugeben, ich hätte nicht erwartet, dass Ihr so tief sinkt, Euch mit Abschaum wie ihm zusammenzutun."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous regarde l'{mf|un|une} et l'autre d'un air furieux.{/n} « J'imagine qu'il s'agit là des privilèges d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, hmm ? Voilà bien longtemps que je n'ai plus la moindre illusion quant à la nature humaine, mais jamais je n'aurais cru quelqu'un capable de s'abaisser à pactiser avec un tel parasite. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's burning glare moves from you to Marazhai.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's privileges in action, I presume? I have long since abandoned any illusions I may have had about human nature, but I must admit I didn't expect someone to stoop so low as to consort with filth like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous regarde l'{mf|un|une} et l'autre d'un air furieux.{/n} « J'imagine qu'il s'agit là des privilèges d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, hmm ? Voilà bien longtemps que je n'ai plus la moindre illusion quant à la nature humaine, mais jamais je n'aurais cru quelqu'un capable de s'abaisser à pactiser avec un tel parasite. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in hararetli bakışları, senden Marazhai'a dönüyor.{/n} "Bakıyorum da Hür Tacir'in imtiyazlarından istifade etmeye başlamışsın. İnsan doğası hakkındaki tüm yanılgılarımı bir kenara bırakalı uzun zaman oldu. Yine de itiraf etmeliyim ki kimsenin böylesine namussuzlarla düşüp kalkacak kadar alçalmasını beklemezdim."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's burning glare moves from you to Marazhai.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's privileges in action, I presume? I have long since abandoned any illusions I may have had about human nature, but I must admit I didn't expect someone to stoop so low as to consort with filth like this."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in hararetli bakışları senden Marazhai'a dönüyor.{/n} "Bakıyorum da Hür Tacir'in imtiyazlarından istifade etmeye başlamışsın. İnsan doğası hakkındaki tüm yanılgılarımı bir kenara bırakalı uzun zaman oldu ama itiraf etmem lazım ki kimsenin böylesine namussuzlarla düşüp kalkacak kadar alçalmasını hiç beklemezdim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
